text: Polt is a surname. Notable people with the surname include: *Gerhard Polt (born 1942), German writer, filmmaker, actor and satirical cabaret artist *Michael C. Polt (born 1954), American diplomat *Péter Polt (born 1955), Hungarian jurist *Richard Polt (born 1964), American Philosophy professor == See also == * Sypolt
title: Polt
